name: Analyzing Tagged Data
tagline: A Recommender system and a Report Generator with Exploratory Visualizations for your data with tags
body:
* A recommender system to suggest objects or tags based on set of *visited* objects or tags.
* An automatic reportgeneration system of different visualizations of the tagged data using `knitr`

![](http://github.com/talegari/ExData_Plotting1/blob/master/plot1.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
